org.seedstack.shed.text

Class TextWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.seedstack.shed.text.TextWrapper

  • public class TextWrapper
extends Object
    Wrap text to the specified width using a greedy algorithm. A continuation symbol can be used when a long word doesn't fit on one line and must be broken apart.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DEFAULT_CONTINUATION 
      static boolean DEFAULT_STRICT_MODE 
      static int DEFAULT_WIDTH 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextWrapper()
      Creates a text wrapper with the default options.
      TextWrapper(int width)
      Creates a text wrapper with a custom line width.
      TextWrapper(int width, String continuation)
      Creates a text wrapper with a custom line width and a custom continuation character.
      TextWrapper(int width, String continuation, boolean strict)
      Creates a text wrapper with a custom line width, a custom continuation character and a specified strict mode.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Wrap the specified text.

        continuation - the continuation character.

      • TextWrapper

        public TextWrapper(int width,
                   String continuation,
                   boolean strict)
        Creates a text wrapper with a custom line width, a custom continuation character and a specified strict mode.
        Parameters:
        width - the line width.
        continuation - the continuation character.
        strict - if true, line width is strictly enforced, if false, single words are allowed to go beyond.

    • Method Detail

        public String wrap(String text)
        Wrap the specified text.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to wrap.
        Returns:
        the wrapped text.
